title: Trolls,afk's and feeders
body:
Hey anybody else out there had enough of these feeders,afk's and trolls who don't get punished?

I must say the report system used to be fair to players, but now it seems because League have lost a lot of their players to Overwatch or others games that they don't seem to hand out any punishments anymore. what is the point of having that system if they don't do anything?

I am tired of losing games because of the aforementioned reasons ( I have bad games myself so I am not talking about those people in any way), If this continues this way I for one will be another player quitting this game especially as riot don't give a damn about any of us, maybe they will when they don't have all that money coming in anymore. Same old story with these companies take,take take, never give back just bleed you dry and then wonder why everyone leaves.

If they actually punished these players then maybe there would be less of them so we could all have some fun maybe.

Well riot I for one am very disappointed with you and you are not the only game around anymore, so the ball is in your court do something or watch your player base slowly dwindle and then all you will be left with is the higher divisions and their smurf accounts.

As for all you League players who actually play to have fun, try and climb the ranks and do your best, I wish you all the best of luck in your future games and I do hope that none of you have to suffer too much with all these people who want to spoil your fun on this.

replies.body: It would help if in blind picks new players were not dropped off in the deep end of the pool. They have player levels in this game they should be using that or something. The new players in the game need the time to learn player vs player and the long time players don't want games where they are babysitting or having bad games because one player is just to new. It's not any fun on the side of being called a feeder they just need a better way of sorting out players in blind picks. New players are good for a game. It's all about the sorting out in blind picks.
I only see Riot bans toxic players but not troller or feeder. cuz after that game they got win and nothing happen. Riot should add kick button when someone in team troll or feeding.

yea it was good before, players who deserved it got punished and you felt like they had your back, but now it seems like we are all alone and riot does not GAF about if we are having fun or not as long as they get their money. I hope they sort it soon because it is getting really silly now, over half the gamesI play have 1 of those types of players these days.

I will say that coincidentally now that the schools have finished for the summer there seems to be a lot more of it going on, I have only been playing for about 10 months but I have seen a drastic increase now compared to any other time I have played.

it happens to everyone.. it takes time to punnish them since if im right riot is now using an automatic system untill they decide what to do with the tribunal system... wish they brought it back.. i loved the power that came with it when u had all of ur cases correct
